document_data.mainbody:
indings from the Hinterlands was a quarterly publication that covered news and goings-on about the Sword Coast and an area of the Western Heartlands.
Mingus Etcherly served as editor-in-chief of the journal. Mingus had reporters from Baldurs Gate and Candlekeep to as far east as Elturgard and Scornubel.
In the , a hastily-made issue of Findings was published to inform people of the eminent threat of the cult of the Absolute. It included reports of the cults activities from Elturgard, about an emergent alliance between goblins, Lolthite drow, trolls, and duergar.
